episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_0200:
This Palentine’s Day, we have a sweet
announcement to make!
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_0300:
Now, if you take a look at the Alcremie’s
decorations...
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_0400:
We’re gonna gift everyone the exact same Sweets,
specially made by us!
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_0500:
There are a whole bunch of different designs, so
you can pick what you like!
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_0600:
If you ever befriend a Milcery, you should give it
a Sweet. That’ll make it happy!
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_0800:
When a Milcery holds a Sweet and evolves
into Alcremie...
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_0900: its appearance will change, just like the ones here!
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_1100:
But after it evolves, you can’t swap its Sweet for
a different one to change its appearance...
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_1200:
So, when you give Milcery a Sweet, you better
think carefully!
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_1300: Each person only gets one Sweet from us, too...
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_1400:
Why don’t you play with these Alcremie and
decide which one you like the most?
episode_event_mawhip_0869/4001_1001_1500: Pokémon, fashion, desserts—it’s all about focus!
